General.Name: Array Inc
General.Description: Array Inc. engages in the research, manufacturing, and sale of application delivery controllers, high-end SSL VPN systems, remote desktop access solutions, and application acceleration and WAN optimization controllers. The company also offers network functions platform; and Zentry for modernizing secure access, as well as that helps customers migrate to zero trust security model from perimeter model, such as firewall and VPN. It operates in the Unites States, India, Japan, China, and internationally. Array Inc. was founded in 2000 and is based in Milpitas, California.
